  # Define simulation properties

  influence_factor = 2.5
  
  # Initialize states
  system_states = np.random.rand(num_of_systems)
  
  # External influence
  def external_influence(current_step):
      return np.sin(current_step / 10)
  
  # System dynamics simulation
  for step in range(time_steps):

          external_effect = external_influence(step)
          system_states[i] += external_effect * influence_factor
          if system_states[i] > 1:
              system_states[i] = 1
  
  # Plot results
  plt.plot(system_states)
  plt.title('System States Over Time')
